summary: The module provides a lightweight preview utility that streams video frames from MoviePy clips directly to the FFPLAY player. It defines a context‑managed previewer class that launches FFPLAY as a subprocess, sends raw frame data with configurable size, frame rate and pixel format, and ensures proper cleanup of the external process.
business_intent: Allow developers and content creators to quickly visualize video clips during editing or processing pipelines without saving intermediate files, thereby speeding up iteration and quality checks.
